bamboo-toothbrush.name: Eco Bamboo Toothbrush
bamboo-toothbrush.tip: Bamboo toothbrushes are 100% biodegradable and help reduce plastic waste by up to 4.7 billion toothbrushes annually! Each bamboo toothbrush can replace 3-4 plastic ones in its lifetime.

organic-cotton-tshirt.name: Organic Cotton Essential T-Shirt
organic-cotton-tshirt.tip: Organic cotton uses 91% less water than conventional cotton and supports healthier soil! This t-shirt saves approximately 2,700 liters of water compared to regular cotton shirts.

solar-power-bank.name: Solar Power Bank 20,000mAh
solar-power-bank.tip: Solar power banks reduce dependency on grid electricity and can save up to 50kg of CO2 per year! Perfect for outdoor adventures while staying environmentally conscious.

plastic-pen.name: Plastic Ballpoint Pen
plastic-pen.tip: Plastic pens create long-lasting waste. Consider using refillable or metal pens instead.
